div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 91 Siphnos, 1930 (984) Burial: 320-300 B.C. Contents: 30 AR Alexander III: 1 dr. (Miletus) Athens (4th cent.): 1 tetradr.; 5 dr.; 11 triob. Siphnos: 1 st.; 3 tetrob. Rhodes: 1 didr.; 7 triob. Disposition: New York 26 Newell, NNM 64 (1934), 17 pp., illus.
